<p>
  <h1 style="font-size: 4em !important;">I write code for passion</h1>
</p>

<p>
  Mainly
  <span class="is-2" style="margin-top: 0">
    JavaScript
    <img style="height: 1rem; vertical-align: text-top;" src="data:image/png;base64," alt="">
  </span>
  at <a href="https://www.wonderflow.co/" target="_blank">Wonderflow <img src="/assets/images/wonderflow.png" width="14px" alt=""></a>
</p>
<p>I am a <strong><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Test-driven_development">test aficionado</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agile_software_development">agile enthusiast</a></strong></p>

<p>When I feel really bad, I console myself with some <b>Haskell</b></p>
<p>Depending on the weather outside, I refresh my little but solid <b>Elixir</b> skills</p>
<p><b>Python and Go</b> are programming languages I want to take a closer look at in the future</p>
<p>Into <b>Data-Science</b> and <b>Machine Learning</b></p>
<p>
  Right now I am probably <b>writing code</b> for
  <a href="https://cryptosheet.cc" class="" target="_blank" title="cryptosheet.cc">cryptosheet.cc</a>,
  <a href="https://pomodoro.cc" class="pomodoro" target="_blank" title="pomodoro.cc time tracker">pomodoro.cc</a>,
  <a href="https://github.com/christian-fei/Simple-Jekyll-Search" class="sjs" target="_blank" title="Simple-Jekyll-Search">Simple-Jekyll-Search</a>
  and other  projects, most of the code can be found on <a href="https://github.com/christian-fei" class="github" target="_blank" title="My projects on Github">Github</a>
</p>
